chart_description: The I/O full pressure chart displays the percentage of time the I/O system is stressed due to high demand for I/O resources. A high percentage indicates that the system is struggling to meet the I/O needs of the applications running on it, which can result in slow disk operations and potentially even system instability.

dimension_descriptions.full 10: Percentage of time the I/O system was at full pressure for at least 10 seconds.
dimension_descriptions.full 300: Percentage of time the I/O system was at full pressure for at least 5 minutes.
dimension_descriptions.full 60: Percentage of time the I/O system was at full pressure for at least 1 minute.
